description: Retrieves a paginated list of properties associated with an asset. If you update properties associated with the model before you finish listing all the properties, you need to start all over again.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset. This can be either the actual ID in UUID format, or else externalId: followed by the external ID, if it has one. For more information, see Referencing objects with external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters the requested list of asset properties. You can choose one of the following options: ALL --- The list includes all asset properties for a given asset model ID. BASE --- The list includes only base asset properties for a given asset model ID. Default: BASE.

nested_items.name: assetPropertySummaries
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes the properties associated with the specified asset.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data stream path (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). For more information, see Mapping industrial data streams to asset properties in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measure (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property.

nested_items.name: notification
nested_items.description: Contains asset property value notification information. When the notification state is enabled, IoT SiteWise publishes property value updates to a unique MQTT topic. For more information, see Interacting with other services in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: topic
nested_items.description: The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update notifications.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the composite model that contains the asset property.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The structured path to the property from the root of the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the property. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
